additionalStaff.added: Added {{- staff}} for position {{abbreviation}} for episode {{episode, number}}.
additionalStaff.swapped: Swapped {{- staff}} in for position {{abbreviation}} for episode {{episode, number}}.
admin.guild.added: Added {{- staff}} as an administrator for this guild.
admin.guild.removed: I removed {{- staff}}'s administrator privileges from this guild.
admin.project.added: Added {{- staff}} as an administrator for `{{project}}`.
admin.project.removed: I removed {{- staff}}'s administrator privileges for `{{project}}`.
alias.addedAlias: I added {{alias}} as an alias for `{{project}}` for you.
alias.removedAlias: I removed the alias {{alias}} from `{{project}}` for you.
episode.added: I added episode {{number, number}} to `{{project}}` for you.
episode.removed: I removed episode {{number, number}} from `{{project}}` for you.
error.alias.inUse: That alias is already in use in `{{aliasproj}}`.
error.anidb.apiError: Air date unknown: AniDB API error
error.anidb.notSpecified: Air date unknown: Not specified on AniDB
error.anidb.responseEmpty: Air date unknown: AniDB response empty
error.blameFailureGeneric: The project is complete, or the specified episode could not be found.
error.doneFailureGeneric: Your task is complete for all episodes, or the specified episode could not be found.
error.incorrectAirTimeFormat: Air time must be a 24-hour HH:MM time, ex: 16:30
error.incorrectBooleanFormat: This value is a boolean and must be either 'true', 'false', 'yes', or 'no'
error.noRoster: There are no key staff assigned to that project.
error.notPrivileged: You must be an administrator to perform this action!
error.observerNoOp: You need to either enable /blame or provide a webhook to observe!
error.permissionDenied: You do not have permission to do that.
keyStaff.weight.updated: Set weight of position {{abbreviation}} to {{weight, number}}.
progress.bulk:
I see you've been busy.
**{{taskName}}** for episodes {{start_episode, number}} through {{end_episode, number}} have been updated.
progress.done: Nice job getting the **{{taskName}}** for episode {{episode, number}} done.
progress.done.inTheDust:
Your team is still working on episode **{{currentEpisode, number}}**, but your task there is already done.
The next episode awaiting **{{taskName}}** is episode **{{nextEpisode, number}}**; did you want me to mark that one done instead?
progress.done.inTheDust.doItNow_one:
Okay, I'll do that for you.
**{{taskName}}** is now **{{count, number}}** episode ahead.
progress.done.inTheDust.doItNow_other:
Okay, I'll do that for you.
**{{taskName}}** is now **{{count, number}}** episodes ahead.
progress.done.inTheDust.dontDoIt: Okay; I won't touch anything, then.
progress.done.inTheDust.question: What do you want me to do?
progress.done.inTheDust.timeout: I waited a whole minute, and you didn't tell me what you wanted!
progress.episodeComplete: Also, episode {{episode, number}} is now complete!
progress.projectComplete:
**{{title}}** is complete.
Great job to everyone involved!
progress.skipped:
**{{taskName}}** for episode {{episode, number}} has been skipped.
If you wish to do it for realsies, `/undone` it first.
progress.undone: So the episode {{episode, number}} **{{taskName}}** wasn't done, after all.
project.created:
I created project `{{nickname}}` for you. You may want to consider the following:
1. `/addstaff` to add positions
2. `/keyStaff.weight.updated` to re-order positions
3. `/editproject`: `AniDB` & `AirTime24h` to set airing date/times, and `/airreminder enable` to get airing notifications.
project.deleted: Cleaned out the `{{project}}` project for you. 残念。
project.edited.motdHelp: To reset the MOTD, set a hyphen: `-`
project.owner.transferred: Made {{- staff}} owner of `{{project}}`. Good luck!
